content.raw:
I wanted to use them like singletons. They are members of the class FlashLightSettings. There could be more than one instance of the class, and each one independently accesses them to publish its message. So the first instance will initializes them and the following instances share them.

But yeah, the plugin itself should have the node and pass the publisher to each instance of FlashLightSettings. I will remove them so that they don’t have static variables.
